English:
Tooooo laaaate~! I'm sayin' you're just tooooo
laaaaate~! Yeah!
Chinese:
太慢啦！
Too too too too too too late！
Korean:
늦어, 늦어늦어어어어어어!
투 투 투 투 투 투 레이트으으!
German:
Zuuu spääät! Ich sag’ euch, ihr kommt zuuu spääät!
Yeah!

English: Look who showed uuuuup~! Had to keep me waitin'?
Chinese:
哎，既然勉強趕上了，就原諒你吧！
話說我一直在等你啊！
Korean:
…뭐, 아슬아슬하게 제때 왔으니까 괜찮지만!
그보다 널 기다렸던 거지만 말이야ㅋㅋ
German:
Schau mal, wer da antanzt!
Warum musste ich so lange warten?

English: I rock the truth, baby! No music, no life!
Chinese: No music，no life！！
EnglishCensored: I rock the truth, baby! Music is life!
Korean: NO MUSIC, NO LIFE!!
German:
Ich rocke und sag, wie’s is’!
Musik ist Leben!

English:
Welcome to the holy land~! That's riiiiight~!
This temple of rock and roll soul! The Heavenly
Tower of Tower Records!
Chinese:
歡迎來到Music Lovers的惡魔聖地——
淘～兒～唱～片～！！
EnglishCensored:
Welcome to the holy land~! That's riiiiight~!
This temple of rock and roll soul! The Heavenly
Tower of Shibuya Records!
Korean:
MUSIC LOVERS의 악마적 성지
타아아워어어 레코오오오드!! 에, 잘 왔다아아아!!
German:
Willkommen im gelobten Land! Oh, yeah!
Im Tempel des Rock ’n’ Roll! Im himmlischen
Shibuya Records!

English:
You're through here, one-hit-wonder! Now get
off the stage!
Chinese:
你就是那個拐走玲子、
已經完成使命的過氣搖滾歌手吧！
Korean:
네가 레이코를 납치했다는
이미 역할을 끝낸 과거의 반짝 스타 로커구나!
German:
Du bist weg vom Fenster, du Eintagsfliege!
Und jetzt runter von der Bühne!

English: Let Reiko free, right now!
Chinese: 現在馬上放了玲子！！
Korean: 지금 당장, 레이코를 돌려 줘야겠어!!
German: Lass Reiko sofort frei!

English:
Oh, yeah?! Hey, hey, heeeey~! Monkeys don't
bother me! I'll never set Miss Reiko freeee~!
Chinese:
喂喂喂喂喂喂！
這個刺眼的野猴子是哪來的啊！
Korean:
어이어이어이어이어이어이이이이!
뭐야 그 반짝반짝한 몽키 녀석으으은!!
German:
Ach ja?! Hey, hey, heeey! Kleine Äffchen haben
mir gar nichts zu sagen! Niiiemals!

English:
Now back the heck off! And don't intervene~!
This is between him and me! Don't make a scene~!
Chinese:
我希望局外人別插手。
你別管本大爺和這傢伙的事。
Korean:
외부인은 빠져 줬으면 하는데요ㅋㅋ
이 몸과 이 녀석 사이에, 끼어들지 말아 줬으면 하는데요ㅋ
German:
Und jetzt zisch ab und misch dich nicht ein!
Das geht nur uns beide was an! Mach kein Theater!

English: I need to hear it from her!
Chinese: 我聽這孩子說了！
Korean: 얘기는 이 애에게서 들었어!
German: Ich muss es von ihr hören!

English:
You're a relic, Jimmy KEN! Just a washed up rocker
who lost the music long ago!
Chinese:
你已經是過去的人了！
你已經和主流沾不上邊了，乖乖認命吧！
Korean:
넌 이제 과거의 사람이야!
더 이상 본편에 안 나오니까, 얌전히 있으면 된다고!
German:
Du gehörst zum alten Eisen, Jimmy! Ein
abgehalfterter Rocker, der es schon lange nicht
mehr drauf hat!

English: Rrrrraaaaaaaaaaagh~!
German: Rrrraaaaaagh!

English:
Metal monkey~! I ain't even begun to rock!
Metal monkey~! Can't turn back the clock!
Chinese:
本大爺還沒結束呢！
真正的本大爺現在才要開始！！
Korean:
이 몸은 아직 끝나지 않아!
진짜 이 몸은 지금부터 시작이라고!!
German:
He, Blechaffe, gleich rock ich ab!
Dann zeig ich dir, was eine heiße Sohle ist!

English: We gonna tear this place up!
Chinese: 所以才要舉辦呀——
Korean: 그러니까, 한바탕 해 주는 거라고!!
German: Wir nehmen hier alles auseinander!

English:
This is Jimmy KEN's comeback performance!
And your farewell tour!
Chinese:
舉辦本大爺的大復活祭典和
本大爺“們”的大慶生祭典！！
Korean:
이 몸 DIE부활제 앤――드!
이 몸"들"의 DAE탄생제를 말이야아아――!!
German:
Das hier ist das Comeback-Konzert von Jimmy KEN!
Und deine Abschiedstour!

English: Re-Reiko?!
Chinese: 玲、玲子！！
Korean: 레, 레이코!!
German: Re-Reiko?!

English: Hi, everyone~! You ready to rock tonight?!
Chinese: 嘿！大家High嗎！？！
Korean: 헤이― 불타오르고 있어!?!
German:
Hallo allerseits! Seid ihr heute bereit zum
Abrocken?!

English: Wooooooo!
German: Juhuuu!

English: Hehehe! Awesome~! I think you all know this one...
Chinese: 那麼馬上來進行第一首歌吧！
Korean: 그럼 바로, 첫 번째 곡으로 가 볼까!!
German:
Hihihi! Super! Ich glaube, den hier kennt ihr
alle ...

English:
Oooh! Ephemeraaaal hummingbird~! Your song touches
my heeeeaaaart~!
Chinese:
苦戀的～蜂鳥～
震撼～我的心～♪
Korean:
애달프으으은 허밍 버어어드으으으
나아의 마음으을 떨리게 하네에에에♪
German:
Oooh! Kurzleeebiger Kolibriii!
Ich liiieeebe dich wie niiieee!

English: What the... What... Huh?!
Chinese: 這……這是怎麼一回事？
Korean: 어… 어떻게 된 거야?
German: Was zum ... Wie ... Was?!

English: Hahaha~! Didn't see that one coming, eh?
Chinese: 嘿嘿嘿嘿，怎樣，很驚訝吧？
Korean: 헤헤헤헷, 어때, 놀랐냐?
German: Hahaha! Damit haste nicht gerechnet, wie?

English:
What did you do to Reiko?!
What were you thinking?!
She's got some real pipes!
Chinese:
你對田和玲子小姐做了什麼！？
你到底在想什麼啊！
她唱得真不賴。
Korean:
타와 레이코 씨에게 무슨 짓을 한 거야!?
넌 대체 무슨 생각을 하고 있는 거야!
그녀의 노래, 엄청 좋네
German:
Was hast du mit Reiko gemacht?!
Wie kannst du nur?!
Die hat ein ordentliches Stimmchen!

English: AH-HAHAHAHA!
Chinese: 耶嘿嘿嘿……
Korean: 구에헤헤헷…
German: HA-HAHAHAHA!

English: Huh?!
German: Was?!

English: Waaaaaaaaah~! Oh, yeeeeeeaaaaaah~!
Korean: 빈틈 발겨어어어―――――언!!
German: Woaaaaaah! Ohhh yeaaah!
